description: Users may notice unusual behavior in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 119.0.2151.72 following the installation of security updates addressing CVE-2023-5997. Specifically, they could experience problems related to garbage collection in the browser, which might manifest as lagging performance, unexpected crashes, or failure to render certain web pages correctly. Users on the extended stable build versions 119.0.2151.72 and 118.0.2088.109 may also be affected, and they should refer to KB article number KB-119.0.2151.72 to understand the remediation steps and confirm they are using the updated versions.
